column1: It was found that the cow had been badly treated by the man who had owned her
column2: and who had been in the habit of milking her. Being a high-spirited beast
column3: she then gave him so much trouble
column4: that he was soon glad to be rid of her.She would now let no one touch her but Mabel: so Mr. Brittan finally said that the cow should be Mabel's cow
column5: and that all the butter which the cow yielded should be hers. But Mabel is a generous girl; and so she shares the money she earns. Her mother
column7: and her brothers Oliver and Frank
column8: all get a part of it.Mabel has given the cow a name; and the cow will come to her when she calls her by name. The name is a very pretty one for a cow
